title: Colors: A Magazine About the Rest of the World, Multilingual
description: The white t-shirt is imprinted in the upper half with a floral spray design in  orange of the slogan, a magazine about the world, in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Korean.  COLORS is imprinted horizontally in red in the center.
